title: A Lesbian Elf and a Cursed Princess - Novel Updates

description:
As long as we’re together, we’ll be happy. So begins a yuri adventure!

Rem, an elven girl who had fled her home, arrived at a human town, where she met a cursed princess, Alferez.

Sympathising with the other’s circumstances, the two women embark on a journey to break the curse!

In their dangerous and obscene adventure, they learn more about the true nature of the curse, and about their own secrets...>
